cms.query.QueryText: SELECT ##TOPN## Matrix.##COLUMNS##, CASE WHEN CMS_RolePermission.RoleID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS Allowed, @PermissionID AS PermissionID, @PermissionDisplayName AS PermissionDisplayName FROM (SELECT CMS_Role.RoleID, CMS_Role.Rolename, CMS_Role.RoleDisplayName FROM CMS_Role WHERE RoleID IN (SELECT RoleID FROM CMS_Role WHERE ##WHERE## AND ((@SiteID = 0 AND SiteID IS NULL) OR SiteID = @SiteID))) Matrix LEFT JOIN CMS_RolePermission ON ( CMS_RolePermission.RoleID = Matrix.RoleID AND CMS_RolePermission.PermissionID = @PermissionID) ORDER BY ##ORDERBY##
